snippet.title: Stranded Sails: Explorers of the Cursed Islands | Explanation Trailer (English)
snippet.description:
We are giving the opportunity to try out a free standalone prologue (Demo) of Stranded Sails as a gift for the community. More information can be found via http://www.stranded-sails.com/free-prologue

Stranded Sails is an open world farming adventure full of discoveries and quests! Along with your crew you are ship-wrecked on a mysterious archipelago. Now it's up to you to secure your survival and solve the mysteries deep in the heart of the islands – and finally escape.

Are you interested in the game and would like to talk to the devs directly? Then join us on https://discord.gg/rokapublish

If you're a Steam user, don't forget to wishlist us:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/943260

Twitter:
https://twitter.com/rokapublish
